title: The Favorites - NFL Week 12 Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 12 Best Bets
description:
It's a special Thanksgiving edition of the podcast this week, as Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman welcomes his professional bettor BFF Simon Hunter on to give their top picks on the NFL Week 12 board, including all 3 Thanksgiving Day games. Is Andy Dalton the QB to back in the early game? Are the favored Cowboys a trendy pick worth tailing? And is this the perfect buy-low spot on the Buffalo Bills? Plus a Foxhole bet of the week, a Simon Says pick, a Big Balls Bet of the Week and more!

CHI DET - 9 MIN

LV DAL - 13 MIN

BUF NO - 17 MIN

ATL JAX - 22 MIN

NYJ HOU - 23 MIN

TEN NE - 24 MIN

PHL NYG - 27 MIN

TB IND - 31 MIN

PIT CIN - 34 MIN

MIA CAR - 36 MIN

LAC DEN - 38 MIN

MIN SF - 41 MIN

LAR GB - 42 MIN

CLE BLT - 45 MIN

SEA WFT - 48 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
